common.confirmRemoverank: Do you really want to remove this rank?
common.confirmRemoveselect: Do you really want to remove this select?
common.upload: Choose a json file from your computer:
common.notJson: The file needs to have the .json extension.
common.createElecDesc: Create a new election by filling out the information below or by
common.errorCandidates: You must add at least one candidate!
common.errorNewCandidate: Are you sure you don't want to add
common.errorRetrievingElections: An error seems to have occurred while retrieving all the elections from our server. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.errorRetrievingElection: An error seems to have occurred while retrieving the election from our server. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.errorRetrievingProxy: An error seems to have occurred while retrieving the addresses of the proxies from our server. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.errorRetrievingNodes: An error seems to have occurred while retrieving the status of the nodes from our server. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.errorRetrievingKey: An error seems to have occurred while retrieving the public key from our server. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.errorServerDown: One of our servers seems to be down. Contact the administrator of this website.
common.clickElection: Click on the election name to display additional details.
common.listElection: This page lists all the elections that have ever been created.
common.title: Title
common.confirmCloseElection: Are you sure you want to close this election?
common.confirmCancelElection: Are you sure you want to cancel this election?
common.confirmDeleteElection: Are you sure you want to delete this election? This action cannot be reversed.
common.errorAction: An error occurred while trying to perform this action. Please contact the administrator of this website. Error: {{error}}
common.changeVote: You can change your vote by simply casting a new vote.
common.errorIncorrectConfSchema: Incorrect election configuration, please fill it completely:
common.voteFailure: Your ballot hasn't been taken into account. It might be that the election has been closed or cancelled. Try refreshing the page.
common.ballotFailure: An error occurred while sending your ballot. Please contact the administrator of this website
common.minSelectError: You need to select at least {{min}} {{singularPlural}}.
common.maxSelectError: You cannot select more than {{max}} answers.
common.minTextError: You need to fill at least {{minText}} {{singularPlural}}.
common.maxTextChars: Answer must be less than {{maxLength}} characters long.
common.regexpCheck: Answer must be of the form: {{regexp}}.
common.voteExplanation: You may cast a ballot as many time as you want while the election is open. Only your last vote will be taken into account.
common.noVote: There is currently nothing to vote on.
common.voteAllowed: You are allowed to vote on the election(s) below. Click on an election title to display its ballot and vote.
common.displayResults: The results of the election(s) listed below are available. Click on an election title to access them.
common.noResultsAvailable: There is currently no available results.
common.resultExplanation1: Results for select and text question are given in percentage of the number of votes for a candidate divided by the number of ballots cast.
common.resultExplanation2: Results of rank question corresponds to the percentage of the score a candidate has. Each voter gives candidates points by ranking them (lower is better).
common.resultExplanation3: The score corresponds to the sum of the points a candidate got and is divided by the total number of points attributed across all ballots.
common.notEnoughBallot: The operation failed because less than two ballots have been casted.
common.operationFailure: The operation failed. Try refreshing the page.
common.voteImpossibleDescription: The election is not open for voting anymore.
common.about1: This website hosts the interface of an evoting system. This system runs smart contracts, handled by a set of Byzantine fault-tolerant nodes.
common.about2: When an administrator creates an election, the election parameters are saved on a blockchain and so are every following transaction (closing/cancelling election, casting a vote,...).
common.about3: A distributed key is generated at election creation time so that when a user votes, his/her vote is encrypted with the key guarantying the anonymity of the vote. However the system doesn't enforce the anonymity of the voter.
common.about4: When an election is closed, the nodes shuffle the ballots and check its correctness before decrypting the shuffle and publish the result of the election on a smart contract.
common.inputNodeSetup: Choose which node to start the setup on:
common.inputProxyAddressError: Error: the address of a proxy cannot be empty.
common.confirmDeleteProxy: Do confirm deleting this node address
common.nodeDetails: Add, edit or remove the mapping between a node address and its proxy address.
common.inputNodeProxyError: Error: the address of the node and the proxy cannot be empty.
common.proxySuccessfullyEdited: The proxy address was successfully modified !
common.nodeProxySuccessfullyAdded: The node and proxy addresses were successfully added !
common.proxySuccessfullyDeleted: The node and proxy addresses were successfully deleted !
common.addNodeProxyError: An error occurred while trying to add the node and proxy addresses. Error:
common.editProxyError: An error occurred while trying to edit the proxy address. Error:
common.removeProxyError: An error occurred while trying to remove the node and proxy addresses. Error:
common.enterNodeProxy: Please enter the addresses of the node and the proxy
common.invalidProxyError: Error: the address you entered is not a valid URL.
